variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-carp-clan
dependencies.description: Report errors from perspective of caller of a "clan" of modules

dependencies.name: perl-dbi
dependencies.description:
The DBI is the standard database interface module for Perl. It defines a
set of methods, variables and conventions that provide a consistent
database interface independent of the actual database being used.

dependencies.name: perl-file-sharedir
dependencies.description: File::ShareDir - Locate per-dist and per-module shared files

dependencies.name: perl-json-maybexs
dependencies.description: Use Cpanel::JSON::XS with a fallback to JSON::XS and JSON::PP

dependencies.name: perl-moo
dependencies.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)

dependencies.name: perl-sub-quote
dependencies.description: Sub::Quote - Efficient generation of subroutines via string eval

dependencies.name: perl-test-differences
dependencies.description: Test strings and data structures and show differences if not ok

dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny
dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@

dependencies.name: perl-xml-writer
dependencies.description:
XML::Writer is a helper module for Perl programs that write an XML
document. The module handles all escaping for attribute values and
character data and constructs different types of markup, such as tags,
comments, and processing instructions. By default, the module performs
several well-formedness checks to catch errors during output. This
behaviour can be extremely useful during development and debugging, but
it can be turned off for production-grade code. The module can operate
either in regular mode in or Namespace processing mode. In Namespace
mode, the module will generate Namespace Declarations itself, and will
perform additional checks on the output.

dependencies.name: perl-yaml
dependencies.description:
This module has been released to CPAN as YAML::Old, and soon YAML.pm
will be changed to just be a frontend interface module for all the
various Perl YAML implementation modules, including YAML::Old
